provenance: Gift of the artist to Francis (Franz) Ropes Huntington (1875-1928, Columbus, OH); his second wife, Mrs. Allan Foster (Columbus, OH); his daughter, Sarah Jane Huntington Haubert; Franz Eugene Haubert; (Thomas French Fine Art, Fairlawn, Ohio, 2010; sold to MIA)
signed: below image, in pencil: [No 89  A Stag at Sharkey\'s  Geo. Bellows]; at bottom center, in the plate: [GEO BELLOWS]
title: A Stag at Sharkey's
